00054     {

00089     public function render()
00090     {       
00091        $value = $this->m_Text ? $this->getText() : $this->m_Value;    
00092         if ($value === null || $value == "")
00093             return $value;
00094 
00095         if($this->m_UnSerialize=="Y")
00096         {
00097             $value = unserialize($value);
00098         }
00099 
00100         if($this->m_Translatable=='Y')
00101         {
00102             if(is_array($value))
00103             {
00104                 foreach($value as $key => $value)
00105                 {
00106                     $value[$key] = $value = $this->translateString($value);
00107                 }
00108             }
00109             else
00110             {
00111                 $value = $this->translateString($value);
00112             }
00113         }
00114         return $value;
00115     }
